35  import static org.easymock.classextension.EasyMock.createMockBuilder;

72  public class TestCachingExec extends TestCachingExecChain {
73  
74      private static final String GET_CURRENT_DATE = "getCurrentDate";
75  
76      private static final String HANDLE_BACKEND_RESPONSE = "handleBackendResponse";
77  
78      private static final String CALL_BACKEND = "callBackend";
79  
80      private static final String REVALIDATE_CACHE_ENTRY = "revalidateCacheEntry";
81  
82      private CachingExec impl;
83      private boolean mockedImpl;
84  
85      private CloseableHttpResponse mockBackendResponse;
86  
87      private Date requestDate;
88      private Date responseDate;
89  
90      @Override
91      @Before
92      public void setUp() {
93          super.setUp();
94  
95          mockBackendResponse = createNiceMock(CloseableHttpResponse.class);
96  
97          requestDate = new Date(System.currentTimeMillis() - 1000);
98          responseDate = new Date();
99      }
100 
101     @Override
102     public CachingExec createCachingExecChain(final ClientExecChain mockBackend,
103             final HttpCache mockCache, final CacheValidityPolicy mockValidityPolicy,
104             final ResponseCachingPolicy mockResponsePolicy,
105             final CachedHttpResponseGenerator mockResponseGenerator,
106             final CacheableRequestPolicy mockRequestPolicy,
107             final CachedResponseSuitabilityChecker mockSuitabilityChecker,
108             final ConditionalRequestBuilder mockConditionalRequestBuilder,
109             final ResponseProtocolCompliance mockResponseProtocolCompliance,
110             final RequestProtocolCompliance mockRequestProtocolCompliance,
111             final CacheConfig config, final AsynchronousValidator asyncValidator) {
112         return impl = new CachingExec(
113                 mockBackend,
114                 mockCache,
115                 mockValidityPolicy,
116                 mockResponsePolicy,
117                 mockResponseGenerator,
118                 mockRequestPolicy,
119                 mockSuitabilityChecker,
120                 mockConditionalRequestBuilder,
121                 mockResponseProtocolCompliance,
122                 mockRequestProtocolCompliance,
123                 config,
124                 asyncValidator);
125     }
126 
127     @Override
128     public CachingExec createCachingExecChain(final ClientExecChain backend,
129             final HttpCache cache, final CacheConfig config) {
130         return impl = new CachingExec(backend, cache, config);
131     }
132 
133     @Override
134     protected void replayMocks() {
135         super.replayMocks();
136         replay(mockBackendResponse);
137         if (mockedImpl) {
138             replay(impl);
139         }
140     }
141 
142     @Override
143     protected void verifyMocks() {
144         super.verifyMocks();
145         verify(mockBackendResponse);
146         if (mockedImpl) {
147             verify(impl);
148         }
149     }
150 
151 
152     @Test
153     public void testRequestThatCannotBeServedFromCacheCausesBackendRequest() throws Exception {
154         cacheInvalidatorWasCalled();
155         requestPolicyAllowsCaching(false);
156         mockImplMethods(CALL_BACKEND);
157 
158         implExpectsAnyRequestAndReturn(mockBackendResponse);
159         requestIsFatallyNonCompliant(null);
160 
161         replayMocks();
162         final HttpResponse result = impl.execute(route, request, context);
163         verifyMocks();
164 
165         Assert.assertSame(mockBackendResponse, result);
166     }
167 
168     @Test
169     public void testCacheMissCausesBackendRequest() throws Exception {
170         mockImplMethods(CALL_BACKEND);
171         cacheInvalidatorWasCalled();
172         requestPolicyAllowsCaching(true);
173         getCacheEntryReturns(null);
174         getVariantCacheEntriesReturns(new HashMap<String,Variant>());
175 
176         requestIsFatallyNonCompliant(null);
177 
178         implExpectsAnyRequestAndReturn(mockBackendResponse);
179 
180         replayMocks();
181         final HttpResponse result = impl.execute(route, request, context);
182         verifyMocks();
183 
184         Assert.assertSame(mockBackendResponse, result);
185         Assert.assertEquals(1, impl.getCacheMisses());
186         Assert.assertEquals(0, impl.getCacheHits());
187         Assert.assertEquals(0, impl.getCacheUpdates());
188     }
189 
190     @Test
191     public void testUnsuitableUnvalidatableCacheEntryCausesBackendRequest() throws Exception {
192         mockImplMethods(CALL_BACKEND);
193         cacheInvalidatorWasCalled();
194         requestPolicyAllowsCaching(true);
195         requestIsFatallyNonCompliant(null);
196 
197         getCacheEntryReturns(mockCacheEntry);
198         cacheEntrySuitable(false);
199         cacheEntryValidatable(false);
200         expect(mockConditionalRequestBuilder.buildConditionalRequest(request, mockCacheEntry))
201             .andReturn(request);
202         backendExpectsRequestAndReturn(request, mockBackendResponse);
203         expect(mockBackendResponse.getProtocolVersion()).andReturn(HttpVersion.HTTP_1_1);
204         expect(mockBackendResponse.getStatusLine()).andReturn(
205             new BasicStatusLine(HttpVersion.HTTP_1_1, 200, "Ok"));
206 
207         replayMocks();
208         final HttpResponse result = impl.execute(route, request, context);
209         verifyMocks();
210 
211         Assert.assertSame(mockBackendResponse, result);
212         Assert.assertEquals(0, impl.getCacheMisses());
213         Assert.assertEquals(1, impl.getCacheHits());
214         Assert.assertEquals(1, impl.getCacheUpdates());
215     }
216 
217     @Test
218     public void testUnsuitableValidatableCacheEntryCausesRevalidation() throws Exception {
219         mockImplMethods(REVALIDATE_CACHE_ENTRY);
220         cacheInvalidatorWasCalled();
221         requestPolicyAllowsCaching(true);
222         requestIsFatallyNonCompliant(null);
223 
224         getCacheEntryReturns(mockCacheEntry);
225         cacheEntrySuitable(false);
226         cacheEntryValidatable(true);
227         cacheEntryMustRevalidate(false);
228         cacheEntryProxyRevalidate(false);
229         mayReturnStaleWhileRevalidating(false);
230 
231         expect(impl.revalidateCacheEntry(
232                 isA(HttpRoute.class),
233                 isA(HttpRequestWrapper.class),
234                 isA(HttpClientContext.class),
235                 (HttpExecutionAware) isNull(),
236                 isA(HttpCacheEntry.class))).andReturn(mockBackendResponse);
237 
238         replayMocks();
239         final HttpResponse result = impl.execute(route, request, context);
240         verifyMocks();
241 
242         Assert.assertSame(mockBackendResponse, result);
243         Assert.assertEquals(0, impl.getCacheMisses());
244         Assert.assertEquals(1, impl.getCacheHits());
245         Assert.assertEquals(0, impl.getCacheUpdates());
246     }
247 
248     @Test
249     public void testRevalidationCallsHandleBackEndResponseWhenNot200Or304() throws Exception {
250         mockImplMethods(GET_CURRENT_DATE, HANDLE_BACKEND_RESPONSE);
251 
252         final HttpRequestWrapper validate = HttpRequestWrapper.wrap(
253                 new BasicHttpRequest("GET", "/", HttpVersion.HTTP_1_1));
254         final CloseableHttpResponse originResponse = Proxies.enhanceResponse(
255                 new BasicHttpResponse(HttpVersion.HTTP_1_1,  HttpStatus.SC_NOT_FOUND, "Not Found"));
256         final CloseableHttpResponse finalResponse = Proxies.enhanceResponse(
257                 HttpTestUtils.make200Response());
258 
259         conditionalRequestBuilderReturns(validate);
260         getCurrentDateReturns(requestDate);
261         backendExpectsRequestAndReturn(validate, originResponse);
262         getCurrentDateReturns(responseDate);
263         expect(impl.handleBackendResponse(
264                 eq(route),
265                 same(validate),
266                 same(context),
267                 (HttpExecutionAware) isNull(),
268                 eq(requestDate),
269                 eq(responseDate),
270                 same(originResponse))).andReturn(finalResponse);
271 
272         replayMocks();
273         final HttpResponse result =
274             impl.revalidateCacheEntry(route, request, context, null, entry);
275         verifyMocks();
276 
277         Assert.assertSame(finalResponse, result);
278     }
279 
280     @Test
281     public void testRevalidationUpdatesCacheEntryAndPutsItToCacheWhen304ReturningCachedResponse()
282             throws Exception {
283 
284         mockImplMethods(GET_CURRENT_DATE);
285 
286         final HttpRequestWrapper validate = HttpRequestWrapper.wrap(
287                 new BasicHttpRequest("GET", "/", HttpVersion.HTTP_1_1));
288         final HttpResponse originResponse = Proxies.enhanceResponse(
289             new BasicHttpResponse(HttpVersion.HTTP_1_1, HttpStatus.SC_NOT_MODIFIED, "Not Modified"));
290         final HttpCacheEntry updatedEntry = HttpTestUtils.makeCacheEntry();
291 
292         conditionalRequestBuilderReturns(validate);
293         getCurrentDateReturns(requestDate);
294         backendExpectsRequestAndReturn(validate, originResponse);
295         getCurrentDateReturns(responseDate);
296         expect(mockCache.updateCacheEntry(
297                 eq(host),
298                 same(request),
299                 same(entry),
300                 same(originResponse),
301                 eq(requestDate),
302                 eq(responseDate)))
303             .andReturn(updatedEntry);
304         expect(mockSuitabilityChecker.isConditional(request)).andReturn(false);
305         responseIsGeneratedFromCache();
306 
307         replayMocks();
308         impl.revalidateCacheEntry(route, request, context, null, entry);
309         verifyMocks();
310     }
311 
312     @Test
313     public void testEndlessResponsesArePassedThrough() throws Exception {
314         impl = createCachingExecChain(mockBackend, new BasicHttpCache(), CacheConfig.DEFAULT);
315 
316         final HttpResponse resp1 = new BasicHttpResponse(HttpVersion.HTTP_1_1, HttpStatus.SC_OK, "OK");
317         resp1.setHeader("Date", DateUtils.formatDate(new Date()));
318         resp1.setHeader("Server", "MockOrigin/1.0");
319         resp1.setHeader(HTTP.TRANSFER_ENCODING, HTTP.CHUNK_CODING);
320 
321         final AtomicInteger size = new AtomicInteger();
322         final AtomicInteger maxlength = new AtomicInteger(Integer.MAX_VALUE);
323         resp1.setEntity(new InputStreamEntity(new InputStream() {
324             private Throwable closed;
325 
326             @Override
327             public void close() throws IOException {
328                 closed = new Throwable();
329                 super.close();
330             }
331 
332             @Override
333             public int read() throws IOException {
334                 Thread.yield();
335                 if (closed != null) {
336                     throw new IOException("Response has been closed");
337 
338                 }
339                 if (size.incrementAndGet() > maxlength.get()) {
340                     return -1;
341                 }
342                 return 'y';
343             }
344         }));
345 
346         final CloseableHttpResponse resp = mockBackend.execute(
347                 EasyMock.isA(HttpRoute.class),
348                 EasyMock.isA(HttpRequestWrapper.class),
349                 EasyMock.isA(HttpClientContext.class),
350                 EasyMock.<HttpExecutionAware>isNull());
351         EasyMock.expect(resp).andReturn(Proxies.enhanceResponse(resp1));
352 
353         final HttpRequestWrapper req1 = HttpRequestWrapper.wrap(HttpTestUtils.makeDefaultRequest());
354 
355         replayMocks();
356         final CloseableHttpResponse resp2 = impl.execute(route, req1, context, null);
357         maxlength.set(size.get() * 2);
358         verifyMocks();
359         assertTrue(HttpTestUtils.semanticallyTransparent(resp1, resp2));
360     }
361 
362     @Test
363     public void testCallBackendMakesBackEndRequestAndHandlesResponse() throws Exception {
364         mockImplMethods(GET_CURRENT_DATE, HANDLE_BACKEND_RESPONSE);
365         final HttpResponse resp = new BasicHttpResponse(HttpVersion.HTTP_1_1, HttpStatus.SC_OK, "OK");
366         getCurrentDateReturns(requestDate);
367         backendExpectsRequestAndReturn(request, resp);
368         getCurrentDateReturns(responseDate);
369         handleBackendResponseReturnsResponse(request, resp);
370 
371         replayMocks();
372 
373         impl.callBackend(route, request, context, null);
374 
375         verifyMocks();
376     }
377 
378     private IExpectationSetters<CloseableHttpResponse> implExpectsAnyRequestAndReturn(
379             final CloseableHttpResponse response) throws Exception {
380         final CloseableHttpResponse resp = impl.callBackend(
381                 EasyMock.isA(HttpRoute.class),
382                 EasyMock.isA(HttpRequestWrapper.class),
383                 EasyMock.isA(HttpClientContext.class),
384                 EasyMock.<HttpExecutionAware>isNull());
385         return EasyMock.expect(resp).andReturn(response);
386     }
387 
388     private void getVariantCacheEntriesReturns(final Map<String,Variant> result) throws IOException {
389         expect(mockCache.getVariantCacheEntriesWithEtags(host, request)).andReturn(result);
390     }
391 
392     private void cacheInvalidatorWasCalled()  throws IOException {
393         mockCache.flushInvalidatedCacheEntriesFor(
394                 (HttpHost)anyObject(),
395                 (HttpRequest)anyObject());
396     }
397 
398     private void getCurrentDateReturns(final Date date) {
399         expect(impl.getCurrentDate()).andReturn(date);
400     }
401 
402     private void handleBackendResponseReturnsResponse(final HttpRequestWrapper request, final HttpResponse response)
403             throws IOException {
404         expect(
405                 impl.handleBackendResponse(
406                         isA(HttpRoute.class),
407                         same(request),
408                         isA(HttpClientContext.class),
409                         (HttpExecutionAware) isNull(),
410                         isA(Date.class),
411                         isA(Date.class),
412                         isA(CloseableHttpResponse.class))).andReturn(
413                                 Proxies.enhanceResponse(response));
414     }
415 
416     private void mockImplMethods(final String... methods) {
417         mockedImpl = true;
418         impl = createMockBuilder(CachingExec.class).withConstructor(
419                 mockBackend,
420                 mockCache,
421                 mockValidityPolicy,
422                 mockResponsePolicy,
423                 mockResponseGenerator,
424                 mockRequestPolicy,
425                 mockSuitabilityChecker,
426                 mockConditionalRequestBuilder,
427                 mockResponseProtocolCompliance,
428                 mockRequestProtocolCompliance,
429                 config,
430                 asyncValidator).addMockedMethods(methods).createNiceMock();
431     }
